content.question:
OPEN-PIT COAL MINING

Source: Pixabay

The image shows an open-pit coal mine in the United States. Which of the following best explains a limitation of the image in analyzing economic patterns of coal mining?

choices.label: It does not indicate the pattern of environmental impacts associated with open-pit coal mining.
It does not convey the availability of alternative sources of energy within the area shown.
It does not indicate potential health risks associated with working at a coal mine.
It does not indicate patterns of restructuring that have resulted in a decrease in coal mining jobs.
It does not convey the distance of the coal mine to the closest urban area.

content.answer: It does not indicate patterns of restructuring that have resulted in a decrease in coal mining jobs.
